articles.title: Anthropic to pay $1.5 billion to settle lawsuit over pirated chatbot training material
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic has agreed to pay $1.5 billion to settle a class-action lawsuit by book authors who say the company took pirated copies of their works to train its chatbot.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic to pay $1.5 billion to settle lawsuit over pirated chatbot training material
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic has agreed to pay $1.5 billion to settle a class-action lawsuit by book authors who say the company took pirated copies of their works to train its chatbot.

articles.title: Anthropic tells US judge it will pay $1.5 billion to settle author class action
articles.summary: Anthropic told a San Francisco federal judge on Friday that it has agreed to pay $1.5 billion to settle a class-action lawsuit from a group of authors who accused the artificial intelligence company of using their books to train its AI chatbot Claude without permission.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic tells US judge it will pay $1.5 billion to settle author class action
articles.translated_summary: Anthropic told a San Francisco federal judge on Friday that it has agreed to pay $1.5 billion to settle a class-action lawsuit from a group of authors who accused the artificial intelligence company of using their books to train its AI chatbot Claude without permission.

articles.title: Duke University pilot project examining pros and cons of using artificial intelligence in college
articles.summary: Duke University in North Carolina has launched an initiative to examine the opportunities and challenges that artificial intelligence brings to student life.
articles.translated_title: Duke University pilot project examining pros and cons of using artificial intelligence in college

articles.title: Duke University Pilot Project Examining Pros and Cons of Using Artificial Intelligence in College
articles.summary: DURHAM, N.C. (AP) ‚Äî As generative artificial intelligence tools like ChatGPT have become increasingly prevalent in academic settings, faculty and students have been forced to adapt.

articles.title: OpenAI Wants You to Get a Certificate in ChatGPT and Find Your Next Job
articles.summary: The artificial intelligence company plans to add certifications and a jobs platform to help companies find workers "actually fluent in AI."
articles.translated_title: OpenAI Wants You to Get a Certificate in ChatGPT and Find Your Next Job

articles.title: AI firm plans to reconstruct 'lost' footage from Orson Welles' 'The Magnificent Ambersons'
articles.summary: Showrunner, a tech platform, plans to use artificial intelligence to reconstruct 43 minutes of excised footage from Orson Welles' "The Magnificent Ambersons."
articles.translated_title: AI firm plans to reconstruct 'lost' footage from Orson Welles' 'The Magnificent Ambersons'

articles.title: Oakland Ballers to use artificial intelligence to manage Saturday home game against Great Falls
articles.summary: The playoff-bound Ballers of the independent Pioneer League are turning to AI to manage most aspects of Saturday‚Äôs home game against the Great Falls Voyagers at Raimondi Park.

articles.title: Tesla shareholders to vote on xAI investment in November
articles.summary: Tesla Inc. shareholders will vote in November to decide if the electric carmaker should invest in Elon Musk's closely held artificial intelligence startup, xAI.

articles.title: Why Docusign Stock Is Surging Friday
articles.summary: Docusign posted strong quarterly results and boosted its outlook as it added more customers and expanded its artificial intelligence offerings.
